workflow:
Access CardioServer → Log in with AD credentials → Confirm Tech role → 
        Use Worklist to filter studies → Link study to correct patient/order → Assign to provider → 
        Upload ECG/Stress tests if needed → Trash/Restore preliminary studies → Use Facility filter for multi-site → 
        Check statuses: Preliminary, Unconfirmed, Confirmed, Stored → Access Help/User Manual

qa.q: What if a study doesn’t match any patient/order?
qa.a: Use Link/Reconcile → search MRN → choose correct order.

qa.q: Can I trash a study that’s already Unconfirmed?
qa.a: No, only Preliminary can be trashed.

qa.q: How to restore a deleted study?

qa.a: Upload → ECG → Browse → MRN → Upload → Link → Assign.
Open study → Provider field → Search → Save.

workflow:
Open patient encounter in O2 → Locate Connect section (Rooming or Plan tab) → 
        Start Video Visit → Test microphone/camera → Admit participants → Manage participants (mute, remove) → 
        Share screen if needed → Invite providers/guests via Send Link → End Call (not Leave)

qa.a: Found on Rooming or Plan tab.
Send Direct Link → enter name + phone/email.

qa.q: What’s the difference between Leave vs End Call?
qa.a: Leave keeps call running; End ends for all.

workflow:
Open ED Track Board → View patient details (bed, age, complaint, acuity) → 
        Monitor icons (EKG, meds, labs) → Check registration & disposition columns → 
        Customize layout (drag/drop, summary views) → Use Triage Navigator → 
        Document in specialty narrators (trauma, stroke, sepsis) → Collect specimens (barcode/labels) → 
        Complete disposition/discharge workflows → Use electronic consents → Crisis workers use Crisis Navigator

qa.q: Can patient discharge proceed with incomplete registration?

workflow:
Phlebotomy: Check in patient → Enter order → Print labels → Scan wristband + specimen → Transport. 
Receiving: Scan specimens → Override/add FYIs → Cancel/redraw if needed. 
Tech Role: Manage Outstanding list → Perform repeats → Verify results → Document critical values → Run QC. 
General: Enter requisitions → Inquiry → Print/reprint → Send-out bench (packing lists). 
Packing Lists: Create → Add specimens → Assign destination (LabCorp/Alverno) → Mark ready/picked up → Track status.

qa.q: How to batch send-outs at Holy Family?

workflow:
Login with Epic credentials → Confirm Dept + Role → Open patient/case → Verify demographics → 
        Consent via e-signature (Anesthesia, Blood, Spanish if needed) → Capture signatures or scan paper if refused → 
        Place specimen orders + print/scan labels → Enter results → Complete EKG orders → 
        Place blood orders + transfuse (dual sign-off) → Document intra-op quick events → Manage supplies → 
        Enter dressing/laterality → Document PACU comments → Schedule via Snapboard → Capture charges (CPT) → 
        Attach/disassociate devices → Use Inter-Procedure Navigator (vitals, I/O, meds, EBL) → 
        Post-procedure billing (I/O, duplicate charges check) → Submit tickets if errors.

qa.q: How to handle refusal of consent?
qa.a: Print, get ink signature, scan to HIM.
Search by item name or manufacturer #.
Disassociate in PACU when patient leaves.

workflow:
Login → Confirm Dept/Role → Patient List (My Patients/My Unit) → Assign/unassign → 
        Chart Review (labs, notes, imaging) → Write Notes (new note, templates, macros, dictation) → 
        Manage Orders (place, modify, discontinue, sets, reconciliation) → 
        Admission Navigator (history, allergies, meds, order sets) → 
        Transfer Navigator (orders, team updates, reconcile) → 
        Discharge Navigator (reconcile problems/meds, prescribe, AVS, instructions) → 
        In Basket (cosign requests, incomplete notes, results) → Secure Chat (with chart attach)

qa.q: How do I add/remove patient from list?
How to pend vs sign note?

qa.a: Compare home meds vs current → continue, discontinue, update.

qa.q: Can I attach chart to secure chat?
qa.a: Yes, via paperclip in Secure Chat.

workflow:
Login to Willow Dashboard → Review In Basket messages → Track IV/unit dose card status → Run ADT census & tech reports → 
        Use Dispense button for prep, cart fill, compounding, repackaging → Manage med lists (ADS tab for Omnicell/Pyxis IDs) → 
        Create Smart Texts for labels → Validate barcodes daily → Resolve NDC mismatches via tickets → 
        Work Verification Queue (mixture records, med base changes) → Adjust settings for patient’s own meds (no charge, patient supply). 
        Troubleshoot label printing by reprinting/rerouting → Escalate persistent printer issues via ticketing.

qa.q: How to reprint cart fill labels?

qa.a: Reroute print jobs → escalate if unresolved.
Submit NDC, strength, form, cost to pharmacy team.
Clinical edit details, select new base.

qa.q: How to flag patient’s own meds?

workflow:
Login → Access Learning Home (tip sheets: efficiency, chart correction, fax workaround, MyChart, Quick Start) → 
        Use MA/Physician dashboards (eprescribe, labs, Haiku setup) → Switch to full clinic schedule view → 
        Use Status column (check-in, rooming, updates) → Review Social Determinants on Storyboard → 
        Perform Rooming workflow (set preferred lab) → Complete Screenings (Medicare Wellness, custom via Flowsheets) → 
        Use customizable dual-pane Navigator → Capture charges (auto vs manual: meds, immunizations, POCT, procedures, supplies) → 
        Place lab/referral orders with correct status/class → Document specimen collection for clinic collect → 
        Handle referrals (internal = more steps, external = fewer) → Enroll missing providers via FIND → 
        Support MyChart sign-up (send text/email, regenerate codes, 14-day expiry) → 
        Telemedicine visits (use Telemed visit type, provider joins via Epic/Haiku) → 
        In Basket pool management → Submit tickets with 'Wave 18' + MRN + dept + issue summary → External PDMP via ILPMP.org until integrated.

qa.q: Why set preferred lab in rooming?
qa.a: Ensures correct routing of lab results.
Auto: med + admin charges drop when documented.

qa.q: How to add missing provider for referral?
How to sign up patient for MyChart?
qa.a: Send activation via text/email → code valid 14 days.
